channel.title: life-lessons on knowledge base
channel.description: Recent content in life-lessons on knowledge base

item.title: When Time Is Right
item.description: Sometimes I get very important things from very weird place. I have this habit of wandering at odd place, without reason. One such place in digital world is youtube, my time-killer While randomly watching youtube video, this You need to focus on giving your 100%, it doesn’t matter you reach on top or not, but you should give your 100 advice came in a video. It such a simple advice and probably would have listened to it 1000 times, but this time it actually made me think.

item.title: Leadership Lecture Sam Manekshaw
item.description: A summarised transcript by fellow youtuber at video According to manekshaw sir qualities of leader professional competence : He provided example of Defence Minister who had no idea about howitzer, motor etc how can he lead the army officers !! ability to take a decision and take a full responsibility for it : üëâüèª act of omission is much worse than act of commission of wrong. üëâüèª why a person don’t take decision?

item.title: Do Work With Joy
item.description: Don’t give up because it’s hard, if you love it: “do it”. It has to be done with joy, there is no point of adding more misery to our little world Work should be done because you want to do it, you like it. It would bring best from you, else whole point of living life miserably doesn’t make sense. No point of doing work which you don’t like in life, that life is not a full life, and life should be lived fully, joyfully.
